body_html: StepLR does not depend on any external parameters except for current step, while ReduceLROnPlateau is designed to reduce learning rate when a metric has stopped improving. Thus it should be called after validate() (in this case it is the validation error).

body: `StepLR` does not depend on any external parameters except for current step, while `ReduceLROnPlateau` is designed to reduce learning rate when a metric has stopped improving. Thus it should be called after `validate()` (in this case it is the validation error).
